nodes.text: The Bantha Clan was an initiate training clan of the New Jedi Order named after the bantha, a creature found throughout the galaxy. In 35 ABY, it consisted mostly of students who were the between the ages of ten to twelve. In 40 ABY Vekki, a member of Bantha Clan, was saved by Zekk during the raid on the Jedi Academy. They were later rescued and taken to the Jedi Outpost on Endor's Sanctuary Moon.
